recipesJson.name: Fruit From the Stars: Pleiades
recipesJson.author: ninedimensions
recipesJson.description:
I never planned on releasing this recipe because it has been my top secret all day vape for over a year now and I wanted to someday commercialize it, but with how things look these days I don't think that will be a possibility anytime soon. I wanted to share this with all of you to enjoy some damn good and refreshing juice during these economic hardships. 

I present to you my Fruit From the Stars series. This one, of many others, is my hands down favorite. It's profile is a sweet and juicy guava that is beautifully blended into the complex and exotic fruit that is soursop with hints of kiwi.


This is amazing off the bat, but gets even better progressively after the next 72 hours of creation. Doesn't get much better after that, but does NOT fade. 

Hope you all enjoy this as much as I did :)
